title: Escaping Minecraft's Deadliest Prison (ares vault) ft. jjkay03
author: MythrodakTV
description:
Ares Vault is Minecraft's most deadly prison.. Can I escape it? Let's find out, in Escaping Minecraft's Deadliest Prison...

Big thanks to jjkay03 for building this prison, and letting me bully it online for views, and for the opening monologue.
jjkay03's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUnaLtRXTH6tnh6MwtFVA1A
jjkay03's discord:
https://discord.gg/JvEKr9SrAn

My Discord:
https://discord.gg/mhgPASsuC8

TIMESTAMPS:
0:00 - intro
0:45 - captured
2:17 - entry process
3:31 - explanation of things
4:23 - how to escape with mining fatigue
5:10 - escaping ares vault
10:32 - trapping the guards
11:04 - the final steps
11:48 - blowing up the prison

MUSIC:
Doom OST (2016) - Mick Gordon
Doom Eternal OST - Mick Gordon
Carefree - Kevin MacLeod

––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
Carefree by Kevin MacLeod http://incompetech.com 
Creative Commons — Attribution 4.0 International — CC BY 4.0 
Free Download / Stream: https://bit.ly/_carefree
Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/owrhKIN3Y90
––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
Doom Eternal OST (Mick Gordon)
All rights goes to creator of the music : Mick Gordon
Copyright Disclaimer under Section 107 of the copyright act 1976, allowance is made for fair use for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use.
––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

Until next time, ladies, tootloo!

localize.description:
アレスヴォールトは、マインクラフトの最も致命的な刑務所です...。脱出できますか？Minecraftの最凶の監獄からの脱出」で見てみましょう...。

この監獄を作ってくれたjjkay03さんに感謝します。この監獄をオンラインで公開して視聴してもらいました。
jjkay03さんのチャンネルです。
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUnaLtRXTH6tnh6MwtFVA1A
jjkay03のディスコード
https://discord.gg/JvEKr9SrAn

私のDiscord。
https://discord.gg/mhgPASsuC8

0:00 - イントロ

2:17 - エントリープロセス

4:23 - 採掘疲れで脱出する方法
5:10 - アレスヴォールトからの脱出
10:32 - 警備員を罠にかける
11:04 - 最後のステップ
11:48 - 刑務所を爆破する

localize.title: マインクラフトの最凶の監獄（ars vault）からの脱出 ft.jjkay03

localize.description:

大感谢jjkay03建设这个监狱，并让我欺负它在网上的意见，并为开幕式独白。
